DOC.brief_summary: Background : Women likely suffer depression anxiety , link reduced heart rate variability ( HRV ) increase cardiovascular morbidity mortality . The purpose study examine effect 8-week yoga program HRV mood generally healthy woman . The investigator hypothesize would improvement HRV reduction perceive stress symptom depression anxiety yoga intervention . Methods : Fifty-two healthy woman randomize either yoga group control group . Participants yoga group complete 8-week yoga program , comprise 60-minute session , twice week . Each session consist breathing exercise , yoga pose practice , supine meditation/relaxation . Participants ' HRV , perceive stress , depressive symptom , state trait anxiety assess baseline week 9 .
